00199 class Fl_Clipboard_Writer;
00200 class Fl_Device_Plugin : public Fl_Plugin {
00201 public:
00203   Fl_Device_Plugin(const char *name)
00204   : Fl_Plugin(klass(), name) { }
00206   virtual const char *klass() { return "fltk:device"; }
00208   virtual const char *name() = 0;
00214   virtual int print(Fl_Abstract_Printer* p, Fl_Widget* w, int x, int y) { return 0; }
00220   virtual int copy(Fl_Clipboard_Writer* c, Fl_Widget* w, int x, int y) { return 0; }
